1.speaker: left
1.text: Good afternoon! May I see your passport, please?

1.b.speaker: right
1.b.text: Just a moment, I can’t find my passport.

1.b.1.speaker: left
1.b.1.text: Alright, please take your time to find it.

1.c.1.speaker: left
1.c.1.text: I’m sorry, but without a passport you cannot check in. You may go to the information desk for assistance or reschedule your flight.

1.c.2.speaker: right
1.c.2.text: Okay, I’ll go to the information desk.

1.c.2.1.speaker: left
1.c.2.1.text: Alright, have a good day and I hope your issue is resolved smoothly.

1.c.3.1.speaker: left
1.c.3.1.text: Of course, I’ve noted that. You can reschedule at the counter. Have a pleasant day!

1.a.1.speaker: left
1.a.1.text: Thank you. Everything looks good. Please place your baggage on the scale.

1.a.1.1.speaker: left
1.a.1.1.text: How much does your baggage weigh?

1.a.2.a.speaker: left
1.a.2.a.text: Your baggage weight is within the limit. You're all set.

1.a.2.b.speaker: left
1.a.2.b.text: Your baggage exceeds the weight limit. You’ll need to pay the extra fee.

1.a.2.a.1.speaker: left
1.a.2.a.1.text: Here is your ticket. Please proceed to the security check area.

answers.text: Where is the security check area?

1.a.2.a.1.1.speaker: left
1.a.2.a.1.1.text: The security check area is just past the ticket counters. There are two lanes—one on the left and one on the right. Please follow the signs.

1.a.2.b.2.speaker: left
1.a.2.b.2.text: You can pay the extra baggage fee at the payment counter near the ticket desks. Once paid, please proceed to the security check area.

answers.text: Where exactly is the payment counter?

1.a.2.b.2.1.speaker: left
1.a.2.b.2.1.text: The payment counter is right next to the main ticket desks, to the right of the information desk.

1.a.2.b.3.speaker: left
1.a.2.b.3.text: After paying, please proceed to the security check area.

1.a.2.a.2.speaker: left
1.a.2.a.2.text: Please place your carry-on items on the conveyor belt for security screening.

1.a.2.a.3.speaker: left
1.a.2.a.3.text: Do you have any liquids or a laptop in your carry-on?

1.a.2.a.4.speaker: left
1.a.2.a.4.text: Please drink or dispose of any liquids, and place the laptop in a separate tray.

1.a.2.a.5.speaker: left
1.a.2.a.5.text: Perfect, please walk through the scanner.

1.a.2.a.6.speaker: left
1.a.2.a.6.text: All clear. You may collect your belongings and proceed to the waiting area.
